Roland MDX Milling Machine

Uses and Constraints

Materials

~Able to carve/mill resins such as: chemical wood, modeling wax, etc. No metals

Dimensions

~X,Y, and Z Strokes: 12 x 12 x 4-1/8 in or 305 x 305 x 105 mm
